summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein discussing investment strategies related to China. Epstein suggests that Staley should establish a dedicated entity for investments in China, including a board of advisors with Chinese political connections. The email emphasizes the confidentiality of the communication.

persons.name: Jes Staley

Epstein suggests creating a dedicated entity for investments in China.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
